TOPIC
    MailClient - A .NET IMAP, POP3 and SMTP for sending email

SHORT DESCRIPTION
    Provides information about MailClient DLL commands.

LONG DESCRIPTION    
    It allows sending email messages and add the images in the mail body as "CID:" (Alternate View Linked Resources)

WHAT'S NEW?
    Have a look at  *********** https://code.google.com/p/sagibo-mailclient/wiki/MailclientChanges ***********

FEATURES
    - Sending MediaType? as (Html, Plain, RichText?, Xml)
    - Add List of files, To, Cc & Bcc
    - Attached any files
    - Embed images in email
    - Changing the EncodingType
    - Send Async OR Sync mails 

WEB DOCUMENTS AND EXAMPLES:
    see web documents & examples at: https://code.google.com/p/sagibo-mailclient/
          
Please contact me for any issue:

Sagi bar on
